content.value:
Vibrant, fun and entrepreneurial Australian business is seeking to expand its team to include a FULL TIME CONTENT WRITER who will also act as a digital marketing assistant

We are offering a 1 week trial (5 days x 8hrs per day).... moving to full time after that if things work out.

You must have outstanding written English skills - in fact, your writing must appear the same as a native English speaker.

The types of tasks you would generally be doing would include:

- researching blog, article topics

- providing summaries of main points from your research

- writing blogs

- writing newsletters

- optimising written content for search engines

- keeping an eye on google alerts, rss feeds for content ideas

- sales copywriting skills a bonus - but must be willing to learn this skill

- social media management

- transcribing

- assisting our team with other digital marketing tasks

You would also be responsible for uploading written content to blogs, article and Press Release sites.

Personal Attributes:

â¢ Reliable

â¢ Trustworthy

â¢ Eager to learn new skills

â¢ Dedicated

â¢ Attention to detail

â¢ Initiative

â¢ Outstanding written and spoken English skills


In return for your good work, we will:

â¢ Always treat you with respect

â¢ Pay bonuses from time to time

â¢ Offer the opportunity for promotion

You will be required to work on the projects Monday to Friday and be contactable during these days.

You will be hired for an initial 2 weeks as a trial, and if you are able to show yourself as the right person, you will be hired full time on an ongoing basis.


To demonstrate that you have read this application thoroughly, when you apply, please write a paragraph of 200 words that tells us what your favourite movie is and WHY YOU like it!


We look forward to hearing from you...

NOTE: This job is only available to independent contractors as we are looking to bring someone on to be part of our growing team - so please do not apply if you are part of an agency.

content.value:
We are looking for someone to read through our Feedly (rss reader) account full of great content for event planners for our audience and schedule out posts inside of Hubspot's social media scheduling tool each day (this requires copywriting skills to write unique and attract tweets). Essentially you will be our content curation arm of our social media presence.

Also have some small social media tasks that the person would have to follow but finding good content on our RSS reader and scheduling it out for multiple days is the primary activity.

Check out our Twitter to see how we do content curation on there: https://twitter.com/helloendless

content.value:
I am looking to develop an App which:  

- Integrates Google GPS capabilities
- Users can create events on the app and share with other users
- Users can follow events as well as make comments on that event page
- Users can browse several events a set location of distance from their location.
- Users can save events in his/her favorite box.
- Saved events will prompt the user to set alerts on their phones.
- Events are aggregated by using crawling or rss feed.
- Users can browse events by category or search for specific event using the event name or keyword

content.value:
We plan to build from scratch a website which will be an online shopping portal, offering products through affiliate relationships with major affiliate networks such as cj, linkshare, amazon, and so on.. as well as displaying our ebay listings.  Anyone who has built such a site can recommend the logistics of doing so, such as the platform (joomla, drupal, other).  The developer will need to work with affiliate API links and RSS feeds and integrate them on the site. The site should have a reasonably nice looking template we can purchase - what is important is the SEO of the site to generate traffic and ultimately sales (design not so important.. just basic.  Once the site is built, a contract for ongoing support and maintenance will be preferable.  Please provide a quote and how this can be accomplished.  Our company is http://www.startvector.com    This is an internal company project not for a client.  We will work with the developer as far as site design.

Posted On: January 03, 2015 17:23 UTC
ID: 204965460
Category: Web Development > Web Design
Skills: Array
Country: United States
click to apply

content.value:
Design and develop a membership webinar website

a, design and develop a membership website.
Theme of the site is webinar so the design is to focus it.
Video presentation in homepage about the website.
Homepage to show features of our webinar vs others
b, install and customize a webinar plugin
c, integrate it with google+ and youtube
After integration, it will automatically populate all its pages.
d, create an affiliate program to promote www.cohangout.com
Affiliates to sign up free and promote with 50% commission.
Video step by step tutorial for members how to prepare the webinar or video conferencing.
10 Pre-made Video templates and 10 pre-made banners to promote the website.
Provide tracking tool to track all promotions.
e, create a pricing page
integrate it to PayPal
free member has 7 days to try
f, Install social media icons with like and share and linking them to the website.
Visitors can sign up through their Facebook's membership (either Twitter or others is fine)
Social icons are FB, Twitter, Linkedln, Instagram, RSS and others.
g, create visitor tracking to our website and provide following summary page with details of date of visit, IP, location, first time and returning visits, pageloads, unique visit.
h, Provide contents
i, Convert the php autoresponder script to wordpress plugin (licensing job to be issued after this website is completed).
j,  Install and customize landing page plugin. Members will have their backend login to use the landing page. Upload 20 landing page templates to the dashboard. Editor to provide members to edit.
k, Install a Video plugin and customize it, add enhancement by providing multi-user functions since the plugin is for single user only. Upload 20 video
templates for members to use. Provide a video editor as well.

It is essential that beta testing is carried out to ensure all functions work perfectly. You will provide one year support insofar as the functionalities are concerned.

Posted On: January 03, 2015 07:03 UTC
ID: 204964441
Category: Web Development > Web Programming
Skills: Array
Country: Canada
click to apply

content.value:
We require a custom version of XBMC / Kodi (14.0 Helix).
The modifications we require are as follows.
1. remove all "Kodi" (formally "XBMC") logos and replace them with our logo. This would include the replacing logo displayed for this new application as shown in android applications menu, "Starting for the first time" splash screen, Boot screen, as well as replacing the logo in the "skin".

2. Under the system menu - Remove the "system info tab"

3.Under system/settings/appearance/skin - remove the ability to "show RSS new feeds". We would like this to be permanently turned off and removed. No RSS feed should ever be shown.

We would like this new modified version to be delivered in an android sdk format ready to be installed on a new Android TV set top box such as the "T8" from Zoomtac found here:
http://www.zoomtak.net/en/pro_detail.asp?bid=35&tid=35&sid=35&id=49

Android APK for Kodi 14.0 Helix:
http://mirrors.xbmc.org/releases/android/arm/kodi-14.0-Helix-armeabi-v7a.apk

Source code for Kodi 14.0 Helix: http://mirrors.kodi.tv/releases/source/

Budget: $200

ID: 204963886

items.summary:
We require a custom version of XBMC / Kodi (14.0 Helix).
The modifications we require are as follows.
1. remove all "Kodi" (formally "XBMC") logos and replace them with our logo. This would include the replacing logo displayed for this new application as shown in android applications menu, "Starting for the first time" splash screen, Boot screen, as well as replacing the logo in the "skin".

2. Under the system menu - Remove the "system info tab"

3.Under system/settings/appearance/skin - remove the ability to "show RSS new feeds". We would like this to be permanently turned off and removed. No RSS feed should ever be shown.

We would like this new modified version to be delivered in an android sdk format ready to be installed on a new Android TV set top box such as the "T8" from Zoomtac found here:
http://www.zoomtak.net/en/pro_detail.asp?bid=35&tid=35&sid=35&id=49

Android APK for Kodi 14.0 Helix:
http://mirrors.xbmc.org/releases/android/arm/kodi-14.0-Helix-armeabi-v7a.apk

Source code for Kodi 14.0 Helix: http://mirrors.kodi.tv/releases/source/

Budget: $200
Posted On: January 03, 2015 01:33 UTC
ID: 204963886
